wysiwyg_a.p: This function block passes incoming events of different inputs to one common event output.

wysiwyg.p: Incoming events on 'EI1'-Event input or 'EI2'-Event input are immediately passed to the 'EO'-Event output.
The order of events at 'EI1'- and 'EI2'-Event input is not relevant. The sum of input events is equal to the number of output events.
